data.event: Ai Siti Amanah who lived in Garut, located in West Java died on August 15 before health officials were able to determine that she had the deadly virus and only one day after arriving for treatment at the hospital.

event.title: was diagnosed with the illness on August 12

data.event: He was diagnosed with the illness on August 12.
Another boy named Misbah, 20, cousin of Aup died earlier in August and was not tested for the disease but officials say he was exhibiting signs of the illness.

event.title: Three months ago, seven family members died

data.event: Three months ago, seven family members died when they contracted the virus through human to human transmission.
